Name: Fissure
Effect: Ranged. Inflicts Wounds. Damage Roll is Half of the Foe's remaining HP (up to 15) rounded down. If the remaining HP of the foe is 1 this move fails. Ignore the foe's Defenses. -3 Accuracy.
Description: The user tears the ground apart in a monstrous display of force. If the foe falls through the fissure it might need a rescue team to get it out.
